articles.title: Cruise Ship Abandons 9 Passengers On African Island After Tour Overruns - Jalopnik
articles.description: The abandoned passengers included an American couple that was left behind after their excursion on the island of São Tomé and Príncipe overran.
articles.content: Nine passengers from a Norwegian Cruise Lines ship found out the hard way just what happens when you miss the departure time for your ship, after they were abandoned by the rest of their cruise. The … [+3478 chars]

articles.content:
islamabad, pakistan  Global eradication efforts have "cornered polio in a few pockets of Pakistan and Afghanistan, the last two countries where the virus continues to paralyze children.
